tag_list: website-planning, beginning-web-design, principles-of-web-design, web-design-tips, web-design-ideas, instant-website, instant-site, web-design-books, web-design-courses, web-design-online-courses
overview:
Gabriela Jose, Certified Internet Professional completed her course in 2005 from the Informatics Computer Institute of the Philippines. Fast forward five years, she is to realize that the web has changed beyond all recognition and is moving at a dizzying speed.

Though known to be of short temper and forever hopeless with matters of knobs and dials, she has decided to pursue photography as a hobby to the detriment of the Arts. Fortunately, she had been gifted with two beautiful sons who make good – correct that, great subjects despite.

She now lives in one of the 7,107 beautiful islands of the Republic of the Philippines where it is known that the traffic is horrid, but the people are nice.
